title: Lost
description: In the last year, Joanne Watson has survived repeated attempts on her life, wholesale slaughter, and the dissolution on the cornerstone of her new existence.And the hard times are only beginning.As the line between right and wrong, friend and foe, and good and evil continue to blur, Joanne is forced to face another irrefutable fact.The most dangerous demons to fight are the ones you can't see.**WARNING: CONTAINS SCENES OF VIOLENCE, DRUG ABUSE, AND GRAPHIC SEX. READER DISCRETION IS ADVISED**
author: L.M. Pruitt
